remarks: A way to express restricted existential uniqueness of a wff: its restricted class abstraction is a singleton.  (Contributed by NM, 30-May-2006.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)
statement:
reusn $p |- ( E! x e. A ph <-> E. y { x e. A | ph } = { y } ) $.
$d A y $.
$d ph y $.
$d x y $.
